article_title: Love, Hate And Washington Hypocrisy On The Cadillac Tax

article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: Economists love the Affordable Care Act’s Cadillac tax, the excise tax on high-cost employer sponsored health insurance plans. Well, maybe not love. But they do like it a lot. In contrast, unions, Republicans, and even Hillary Clinton want to dump the tax. Why? Pretty much for the same reason economists support [...]
